roleset.name: motion in a new direction

example.name: remember VPs are PRD.
example.text: involuntary turning of her head to the right associated with worsening neck pain

example.name: arg 0
example.text: My turning of the key in the lock alerted him

roleset.note: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to turn.01-v and turn.01-n. Turn.01-v is a member of VN classes crane-40.3.2, hurt-40.8.3, meander-47.7, and roll-51.3.1. Framed by Katie.
